mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POST_REPT PR LEFT JOIN AD_POST_REPT APR ON PR.POST_REPT_CD = APR.POST_REPT_CD WHERE APR.AD_POST_REPT_CD IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CMNT_REPT CR LEFT JOIN AD_CMNT_REPT ACR ON CR.CMNT_REPT_CD = ACR.CMNT_REPT_CD WHERE ACR.AD_CMNT_REPT_CD IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QNA Q LEFT JOIN AD_ANSR AA ON Q.QNA_CD = AA.QNA_CD WHERE AA.AD_ANSR_CD IS NULL

SELECT UI.USER_DSTN_CD AS USER_DSTN_CD , UI.USER_NAME AS USER_NAME , UI.USER_ID AS USER_ID , PB.POST_BAN_DATE AS BAN_DATE FROM POST_BAN PB JOIN USER_INFO UI ON PB.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID UNION SELECT UI.USER_DSTN_CD AS USER_DSTN_CD , UI.USER_NAME AS USER_NAME , UI.USER_ID AS USER_ID , CB.CMNT_BAN_DATE AS BAN_DATE FROM CMNT_BAN CB JOIN USER_INFO UI ON CB.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID ORDER BY BAN_DATE DESC

SELECT P.POST_CD AS POST_CD , P.OPINION AS OPINION , FN_REPT_CATE(PR.REPT_CATE_CD) AS REPT_CATE , PR.POST_REPT_DATE AS POST_REPT_DATE , NVL(FN_CNFM(APR.CNFM_CD), '-') AS CNFM_RESULT FROM POST P JOIN POST_REPT PR ON P.POST_CD = PR.POST_CD LEFT JOIN AD_POST_REPT APR ON PR.POST_REPT_CD = APR.POST_REPT_CD ORDER BY CNFM_RESULT, POST_REPT_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POST_REPT PR LEFT JOIN AD_POST_REPT APR ON PR.POST_REPT_CD = APR.POST_REPT_CD WHERE APR.AD_POST_REPT_CD IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CMNT_REPT CR LEFT JOIN AD_CMNT_REPT ACR ON CR.CMNT_REPT_CD = ACR.CMNT_REPT_CD WHERE ACR.AD_CMNT_REPT_CD IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QNA Q LEFT JOIN AD_ANSR AA ON Q.QNA_CD = AA.QNA_CD WHERE AA.AD_ANSR_CD IS NULL
SELECT NOTI_CD, NOTI_TITLE, NOTI_DATE FROM NOTI WHERE NOTI_PIN LIKE 'Y' ORDER BY NOTI_PIN DESC, NOTI_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER_INFO
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER_INFO WHERE TO_CHAR(USER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LEAVE_INFO WHERE TO_CHAR(LEAVE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT count(*) FROM POST
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POST WHERE TO_CHAR(POST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POST P LEFT JOIN POST_REPT PR ON P.POST_CD = PR.POST_CD WHERE PR.POST_REPT_CD IS NOT NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CMNT C LEFT JOIN CMNT_REPT CR ON C.CMNT_CD = CR.CMNT_CD WHERE CR.CMNT_REPT_CD IS NOT NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER_INFO WHERE TO_CHAR(USER_DATE, 'YYYY')=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') AND TO_CHAR(USER_DATE, 'MM')=#{month}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LEAVE_INFO WHERE TO_CHAR(LEAVE_DATE, 'YYYY')=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') AND TO_CHAR(LEAVE_DATE, 'MM')=#{month}

SELECT UI.USER_DSTN_CD, UI.USER_NAME, UI.USER_ID, UI.USER_DATE FROM USER_INFO UI LEFT JOIN LEAVE_INFO LI ON UI.USER_DSTN_CD = LI.USER_DSTN_CD LEFT JOIN POST_BAN PB ON UI.USER_ID = PB.USER_ID LEFT JOIN CMNT_BAN CB ON UI.USER_ID = CB.USER_ID WHERE LI.USER_DSTN_CD IS NULL AND PB.POST_BAN_CD IS NULL AND CB.CMNT_BAN_CD IS NULL ORDER BY UI.USER_DSTN_CD DESC

SELECT USER_DSTN_CD, USER_NAME, USER_ID, USER_TEL, USER_DATE , SSN, PET_NUM, MRG_YN, CHILD_NUM, FML_NUM, CAR_NUM, HOUSE_TYPE , AREA_FST_NAME, AREA_SEC_NAME, JOB_FST_NAME, JOB_SEC_NAME FROM USER_VIEW WHERE USER_DSTN_CD = #{user_dstn_cd}

SELECT AD_POST_REPT_CD, AD_POST_REPT_DATE "AD_POST_REPT_DATE" , POST_CD, USER_DSTN_CD, USER_DSTN_CD "POST_REG_USER" , POST_REPT_CD, CNFM_RESULT FROM POST_REPT_VIEW WHERE USER_DSTN_CD = #{user_dstn_cd} AND CNFM_CD = 1 AND AD_POST_REPT_DATE >= (ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -6)) UNION ALL SELECT AD_CMNT_REPT_CD, AD_CMNT_REPT_DATE , POST_CD, USER_DSTN_CD, POST_REG_USER , CMNT_REPT_CD, CNFM_RESULT FROM CMNT_REPT_VIEW WHERE USER_DSTN_CD = #{user_dstn_cd} AND CNFM_CD = 1 AND AD_CMNT_REPT_DATE >= (ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -6)) ORDER BY AD_POST_REPT_DATE DESC

SELECT POST_CD, POST_TITLE , (SELECT COUNT(C.CMNT_CD) FROM CMNT C LEFT JOIN CMNT_REPT CR ON C.CMNT_CD = CR.CMNT_CD WHERE CR.CMNT_REPT_CD IS NULL AND C.POST_CD = POST_CD) "COUNT_CMNT" , POST_DATE, POST_VIEW, USER_DSTN_CD FROM POST WHERE USER_DSTN_CD = #{user_dstn_cd} ORDER BY POST_CD DESC
SELECT POST_CD, CMNT_CONT, CMNT_DATE, USER_DSTN_CD FROM CMNT WHERE USER_DSTN_CD = #{user_dstn_cd} ORDER BY CMNT_CD DESC

SELECT UI.USER_DSTN_CD, UI.USER_NAME, UI.USER_ID, UI.USER_TEL , UI.USER_DATE, PB.POST_BAN_DATE "BAN_DATE" FROM USER_INFO UI LEFT JOIN LEAVE_INFO LI ON UI.USER_DSTN_CD = LI.USER_DSTN_CD LEFT JOIN POST_BAN PB ON UI.USER_ID = PB.USER_ID WHERE LI.USER_DSTN_CD IS NULL AND PB.POST_BAN_CD IS NOT NULL UNION ALL SELECT UI.USER_DSTN_CD, UI.USER_NAME, UI.USER_ID , UI.USER_TEL, UI.USER_DATE, CB.CMNT_BAN_DATE FROM USER_INFO UI LEFT JOIN LEAVE_INFO LI ON UI.USER_DSTN_CD = LI.USER_DSTN_CD LEFT JOIN CMNT_BAN CB ON UI.USER_ID = CB.USER_ID WHERE LI.USER_DSTN_CD IS NULL AND CB.CMNT_BAN_CD IS NOT NULL ORDER BY BAN_DATE DESC
SELECT POST_REPT_CD, OPINION, REPT_CATE_NAME, POST_REPT_DATE , CNFM_RESULT, USER_DSTN_CD FROM POST_REPT_VIEW ORDER BY POST_REPT_CD DESC

SELECT POST_REPT_CD, POST_REPT_DATE, POST_CD, REPT_USER_DSTN_CD , CNFM_CD, CNFM_RESULT, AD_CD, AD_POST_REPT_CD, AD_POST_REPT_DATE , OPINION, REPT_CATE_CD, REPT_CATE_NAME, POST_REPT_DTL_CONT , USER_DSTN_CD, POST_TITLE, POST_DATE FROM POST_REPT_VIEW WHERE POST_REPT_CD = #{post_rept_cd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AD_POST_REPT(AD_POST_REPT_CD, AD_CD, POST_REPT_CD, CNFM_CD) VALUES(AD_POST_REPT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{ad_cd} , #{post_rept_cd} , #{cnfm_cd})
mapper.select: SELECT CMNT_REPT_CD, CMNT_CONT, REPT_CATE_NAME, CMNT_REPT_DATE , CNFM_RESULT FROM CMNT_REPT_VIEW ORDER BY CMNT_REPT_CD DESC

SELECT CMNT_REPT_CD, CMNT_REPT_DATE, CMNT_CD, REPT_USER_DSTN_CD , CNFM_CD, CNFM_RESULT, AD_CD, AD_CMNT_REPT_CD, AD_CMNT_REPT_DATE , REPT_CATE_CD, REPT_CATE_NAME, CMNT_REPT_DTL_CONT , USER_DSTN_CD, CMNT_CONT, CMNT_DATE, POST_CD FROM CMNT_REPT_VIEW WHERE CMNT_REPT_CD = #{cmnt_rept_cd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AD_CMNT_REPT(AD_CMNT_REPT_CD, AD_CD, CMNT_REPT_CD, CNFM_CD) VALUES(AD_CMNT_REPT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{ad_cd} , #{cmnt_rept_cd} , #{cnfm_cd})
